titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries

layout.p: X lines per page, approximately X akṣaras per line.
Impressed marginal frame lines, no ruling.

handNote.desc: Bengali in black ink (main text and first set of annotations).
Bengali in red ink (second set of annotations?).

item.add: Invocation (śrī) immediately before the foliation, mid right margin, verso.

Numerous annotations on all margins throughout the manuscript; the first set in black ink was probably written by the scribe of the main text, while the second set in red ink might have been added later.

history.provenance: Donated by Prof E.H. Johnston in February 1940; previously belonged to Evans-Wentz, W.Y. Dr. W.Y. Evans-Wentz.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

change.persName: Camillo Formigatti modified this entry according to the https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bodleian/consolidated-tei-schema/master/msdesc.rng

msDescription.msHeading: Sthānāṅga .. Prākṛta Original Ms. folio numbers are 1032. Out of them these folios are replaced -- - 33, 261, 356, 361, 397, 414, 417, 418, 461, 462, 463, 801, 824, 825, 827, 864, 892, 929, 936, 948, 949, 951, 954, 955, 969, 974, 977, 981, 982, 985, 991.It can be assumed that below listed numbered folios may have lost and are rewritten by other hand but as original are found those are kept at it's original place and new rewritten folios are bound at the end of the work and may be useful as 'paṭhāntara'. those folio numbers are ----12, 252, 257, 260, 263, 296, 358,361,365, 369, 372, 388, 391, 392, 394, 509, 540, 565, 699, 702, 707, 708, 720, 764, 827,928, 966, 989 . Now here in this Ms. folio no. 1033 - 1060 are duplicate of above said folios. Folio no.30, 366, 565, 707, 708 and 827 are torn and needs repair. There are often notes by the other hand. script is clear.

overview.p: This work is a commentary to Sthānāṅga, the 3rd aṅga of the Jaina canon. It is styled as vivaraṇa and ṭīkā as well, by the commentator himself.

msItem.incipit: Begins On folio No.1B Withśrīvītarāgāya namo namaḥI ahaṃ I śrīVīraṃ jinaṃ nāthaṃ natvā Sthāāṅga-katipaya-padānāṃ, prāyo'nya śāstraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ karomy ahaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kiñcit I iha hi śramaṇasya bhagavataḥ śrīmahānmaVīra-Varddhamāna-svāmin Ikṣvāku-kula-nandanasya prasiddha Siddhārtharājas tanorm mahārājasye'va parama-puruṣa-kārā-krānta-vikrānta-rāgādi-śatror ājñākaraṇa-dakṣa-kṣamā-pati sata satata sevitaṃ pāda padmasya sakala-padārtha sākṣātkaraṇa dakṣa kevala-jñāna-darśana rūpa pradhāna ........(on fol.2B 1st line) yat uktaṃ tivarisa pariyāgassau āyārapakappa nāma ajjhayaṇaṃ cau-varissaya sammaṃ Sūyagaḍa-nāma aṅgaṃ ti dasakappa vvavahāra saṃvacchara-paṇaga dikhiyasseve ṬhāṇaṃSamavāu ciyaṃ aṅge te aṭṭha vāsassati ....etc
msItem.explicit: Text Ends On folio No. 1029B withso gāḍhā poggalā aṇantāpaṃ dasa-samata ṭṭhitītā poggalā aṇantā paṇṇattā dasa-guṇa-kāla evaṃ ciṇa uvaciṇa bandha udīrā ce dasa pategā aṇantā poggalāpaṃ evaṃ vannehiṃ gandhehiṃ rasehiṃ dasaguṇalikhā poggalā aṇatā paṇṇattā IchaI sammattaṃ dasaṭhāṇam iti śrīṬhāṇagasūtra saṃpūrṇa I granthāgraṃ 3775 IchaI

[ Comm. Ends On Fol.1030A 6th line] dānena vṛdhyādi śabdenvāta maṅgalam abhihitamayaṃ vānaṃ ta śabda iha sarvā'dhyayanā nāmaṃ te paṭhita iti sarveṣva'pyanta maṅgalatayā bodhavya iti IchaI taṃ devaṃ nigamitam anugamatvārāśa bhūtaṃ sūtra sparśaka niryukti-dvāraṃ śeṣa-dvārāṇi tu sarvādhyayaneṣu prathamā'dhyayana-vadanugamanīyīni IchaI iti śrīmadAbhayadevasūri viracite Sthānākhye tṛtīyāṅga vivaraṇe daśasthānakākhyaṃ daśam-adhyayana samāptaṃ IchaI tat samāpto ca samāptaṃ IchaI ..........[on fol.1031B] iva Vardhamāna jina santāna varttināṃ svīkurvvatu yatho'citama'tortha jātam anutiṣṭatu suṣṭa-cita-puruṣārtha siddhim upayuñjatā ca yogebhya iti IchaI kiñca tat saṃpradāya-hīnatvāt sahṛdayasya viyogataṃ savasva para-śāstrāṇāme dṛṣṭea smṛteś ca me I1I vācanānām ekatvāt pustakā-nāma suddhitaḥ sūtrāṇām api gāṃbhīryan mati bhedāc ca kutra cit I2I kṣūṇāni sa(ṃ)bhavaṃtīhi kevalaṃ suvivekabhiḥ siddhānto'nugato yo'rthaḥ sosmādrgāhye na ve taraḥ I3I śodhya vaitaj jine bhaktairmāma vadbhirdayāparaiḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇāt dhorādapa siddhānta-deśanāt I4I kāryānavā kṣamāsyāmu-yatau'smābhir nāgrahai, etad-gamanikā-mātram upakārīti carcitaṃ I5I tathā saṃbhāvya siddhāntād-bodhyaṃ madhya-sthayā dhiyā Drauṇācāryādibhi(ḥ) prājñiranekairā-vṛtaṃ yataḥ I6I Jina-grantha-viśāla-durgama-vanād-ucciyta gāḍha-śramaṃ sad-vyākhyāna-phalānya-mūni mayakā Sthānāṅga sad-bhājane saṃsthāpyopahitāni durggata-naranprāyeṇa labdhyarthin śrīmat-saṅkha-vibhorataḥ paramamāveva pramāṇaṃ kṛtī I7I śrīVikramāditya-narendra kālād-gatena viṃśatyadhikena yukte samā-sahastre'tigate viddabdhā Sthānāṅga-ṭīkā'lpa-dhiyo pi gamyā I8I chaI atra daśam adhyayanā śloka 1710 Aṇahillapāṭaka nagare vasat Acavuma-Dhanapatir gaṇinā jinadevākhyenādi likhitā Sthānāṅga-ṭīkeyaṃ sarvāṅke ṭīkā grantha saṅkhyā 14250 IchaI
msItem.colophon: . śrī Ṭṭhāṇāṅgasūtra-ṭīkā samāptā IchaI śrī kalyāṇam astu IchaI
